Source code for thorpy.message.solenoidcontrol

from ._base import Message


##### Solenoid Control Messages #####

[docs]class MGMSG_MOT_GET_SOL_CYCLEPARAMS(Message):
    id = 0x4c5
    is_long_cmd = True
    parameters = [('chan_ident', 'H'), ('on_time', 'I'), ('off_time', 'I'), ('num_cycles', 'I')]




[docs]class MGMSG_MOT_GET_SOL_INTERLOCKMODE(Message):

    parameters = [('chan_ident', 'B'), ('mode', 'B')]

    parameters = [('chan_ident', 'B'), ('mode', 'B')]




[docs]class MGMSG_MOT_GET_SOL_STATE(Message):
    id = 0x4c8
    parameters = [('chan_ident', 'B'), ('state', 'B')]




[docs]class MGMSG_MOT_REQ_SOL_CYCLEPARAMS(Message):
    id = 0x4c4
    parameters = [('chan_ident', 'B'), (None, 'B')]
